attributes.action: Set up a police task force investigation in to covid contract fruad.
attributes.additional_details: Public money has been wasted or stolen, instead of writing it off, find out why, and by whom and prosecute fraud.
attributes.background: Allow the Police to Investigate the covid contract process and fraud, wasted billions of public money.

rejection.details:
The police are operationally independent of the UK Government and Parliament, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase efforts to reclaim covid-19 payments lost to fraud: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607090
